    • delete

      public static boolean delete(int quizId)
      Deletes the provided quiz from the database
      Parameters:
      quizId - the quiz ID to delete
      Returns:
      true if successfully deleted, else false if failed

    • addQuestion

      public static void addQuestion(String question, int answer, String answer1, String answer2, String answer3, String answer4)
      Adds the question to the Quiz singleton
      Parameters:
      question - the question message
      answer - the answer between 1 and 4
      answer1 - the first choice
      answer2 - the second choice
      answer3 - the third choice
      answer4 - the fourth and last choice

    • load

      public static void load(int quizId) throws SQLException, InvalidQuizID
      Loads the provided quiz from the database into the singleton
      Parameters:
      quizId - the quiz ID to load
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an SQL error occurs
      InvalidQuizID - if the quiz ID is invalid
